name: MKAnnotationView.CollisionMode
desc: Constants indicating how to interpret the collision frame rectangle of an annotation view.

items.name: case rectangle
items.desc: A constant indicating that the full collision frame rectangle should be used for detecting collisions.

items.name: case circle
items.desc: A constant indicating that a circle inscribed in the collision frame rectangle should be used to determine collisions.

items.name: case none
items.desc: A constant indicating that collisions will not occur.
